eksath jathika paksha nayaka ranil wikramasinha mahatha shri lankawe pasal adhyapanaya laba merata wishwawidyalayakin usas adhyapanaya hadara shri lankika guwan gaman balapathrayak magin lokaye oonama rataka sancharaya kala haki pudgalayaku bawa da mahalekamwaraya wadiduratath penwa dunna. 24 juli	2018 sirikotha gamata genayana wadasatahane di kamarawata hasuwu dasun eksath jathika paksha yanthranaya shakthimath kara pakshaye idiri jayagrahi wadapiliwela sakaskirime katayuththehi wishesha wadasatahanak lesa sirikotha gamata genayana wadapiliwela me dinawala kriyathmaka wanawa.
janadhipathi maithripala sirisena pawasana aakarayata shri lankawe ek laksha panas dahasakata wadi pirisak mathkudu saha wenath wisha mathdrawya pawichchi karathi.
